amendment.description: To make $50,000,000 available under the Edward Byrne Memorial State and Local Law Enforcement Assistance Programs.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3492 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 3492 proposed by Senator Stevens for Senator Kennedy. (consideration: CR S7367; text: CR S7367) To make $50,000,000 available under the Edward Byrne Memorial State and Local Law Enforcement Assistance Programs.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3492 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3492 proposed by Senator Stevens for Senator Kennedy.
